entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 3 timeouts in SendPacketsAsync on Windows 7 #60204
  • Test failures: System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStartInfoTests on windows.11.amd64.clientpre #60191
  • Test failure: NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #60190
  • Loop cloning: generalize recognized loop iteration patterns #60188
    Future
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml issue with .NET Fx WS-Fed replies #60184
  • The static `ChangeToken.OnChange` method throws a `StackOverflowException` when its producer factory returns the same change token instance #60183
  • CTS.TryReset() concurrency issue #60182
    6.0.0
  • Create spec/doc for JSON serialization #60178
  • [tvOS] System.Diagnostics.Tests.FileVersionInfoTest failures #60174
    7.0.0
  • [tvOS] System.Drawing.PrimitivesTest.RectangleTests.RectangleFConversionTest failed #60172
  • WebSocket Client does not respond to ping\pong messages #60171
  • .net core application get out of memory exception in App Service environment(windows machine) when the machine memory is still available #60169
  • [tvOS] Library test suites complain about paths #60168
    7.0.0
  • [tvOS] System.IO.Compression.Tests failures #60167
  • PlaintextMVC benchmark is slow on arm64 #60166
    7.0.0
  • [tvOS] "System.BadImageFormatException : Invalid serialized string" in System.Reflection.Metadata.Decoding.Tests.CustomAttributeDecoderTests.TestCustomAttributeDecoder #60165
  • Dependency on libm.so.6 is missing in libSystem.IO.Compression.Native.so #60164
  • Loop cloning needs failure tests #60159
    7.0.0
  • TimeZoneNotFoundException: The time zone ID 'America/Chicago' was not found on the local computer. #60175
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Tests.TimestampRequestTests.BuildExpectedRequest_FromHashAndOid(viaSpan: True) #60157
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/Vector256/Vector256_ro/Vector256_ro.sh #60154
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\GitHub_45929\\test45929\\test45929.cmd #60152

Closed

  • Do we need to ship Microsoft.NETCore.TestHost? #60197
  • Investigate using Span in BigInteger implementation #22609
    7.0.0
  • JSON out-of-order metadata property support .net 5 #60186
  • [API Proposal]: List<T> AddRange / InsertRange Overloads #60127
  • Output unexpected literal string in MetricsEventSource.ParseSpecs #60110
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V2.0-Beta2/b399444/b399444b/b399444b.sh #60153
  • Test failure Interop\\PInvoke\\Generics\\GenericsTest\\GenericsTest.cmd #60155
  • Test failure Interop/PInvoke/Generics/GenericsTest/GenericsTest.sh #60156
  • GC does not compile when BACKGROUND_GC is not defined. #56186
    Future
  • Make ImmutableArray.CreateRange<T>(IEnumerable<T>) Thread-safe #60126
  • GetSocketOption/SetSocketOption should not close underlying socket #59055
    Future
  • Test failure System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.TestWindowsNlsDisplayNames #60151
  • [JIT][arm64] CSE for VSD calls #60025
    7.0.0
  • Published app silently crashes with: Bundle header version compatibility check failed. #59819
    6.0.0
  • superpmi: enable better % improvement number for asm diffs #41653
    Future
  • Will a .net 5 project be able to use AOT feature? #60130

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor the DAC enumerate memory region phase out of gather crash info #60205
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Disable FromHwnd* tests failing on CI #60202
    area-System.Drawing
  • Add SetLastError to GdiPlus methods (#59096) #60201
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Drawing
  • [reflection] Return n2m wrapper from RuntimeMethodHandle.GetFunctionPointer #60200
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Do not throw StackOverflow exception from `ChangeToken.OnChange` #60198
    area-Extensions-Primitives
  • Add C# multi-dimension array versions of the Benchstones tests #60192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fallocate sets errno on error, posix_fallocate did not #60185
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Fixed exception type for ConnectionShutdownInitiatedByTransport #60181
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/6.0] Fix issue in decommit_ephemeral_segment_pages (segment case). #60170
    area-GC-coreclr
  • CI matrix change: add Windows Server 2022 #60163
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix update: add Ubuntu 21.04 - second attempt #60162
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix: add openSUSE 15.2 - second attempt #60161
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • FileStatus.Unix: cache euid/egid in a static. #60160
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

Merged

  • [6.0] Port "Change profilers to use thread local evacuation counters (#59741)" to 6.0 #60116
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] SafeFileHandle.Unix: don't DeleteOnClose when lock is not successful. #60112
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Finish59071 update ci argsh #60206
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • fix output log message as literal in MetricsEventSource #60176
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Fix Robocopy Verification #60196
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, tenet-performance
  • Rollback verify command changes. #60203
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix GetGenerationWithRange when we have a gen 2 object in the ephemeral segment #60189
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Mark TestHost as non-shipping #60199
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix some of the issues around pgo data collection of stack trace data #59970
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Add beginnings of support for WASI. #59752
    arch-wasm
  • stop building the package proj #60187
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Override `corehost_resolve_component_dependencies` and `corehost_set_error_writer` PInvokes in singlefile scenario. #60111
    Servicing-approved, area-Host
  • [release/6.0] Produce symbols archives #59843
    source-build, area-Setup, 6.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #59810
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Check BackgroundService.ExecuteTask for null #60177
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Use `IntegralRange` in `fgOptimizeCast` #59897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix WebSocket cancel test for non-browser #60173
    area-System.Net
  • Spannified internals of BigInteger #35565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add support for cloning loops with `<=` conditions #60148
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix issue with incorrect handling of optimized method layouts #60109
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Add issue reporting guidelines to CONTRIBUTING.md #60142
    area-Meta
  • Fix gc.cpp compilation with BACKGROUND_GC disabled #59958
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Check BackgroundService.ExecuteTask for null #60139
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Socket: don't disconnect Socket for unknown/unsupported socket options. #59925
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Fix issue in decommit_ephemeral_segment_pages (segment case). #59989
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Stop running runtime tests on Android arm64 in main build #59772
  • Disable rundownvalidation runtime test on MonoVM #60117
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [wasm] Do not strip dotnet.wasm in Debug build #60134
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Support passing total code size through when doing SPMI diffs #60124
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix TimeZones Test failure #60150
    area-System.Runtime, 6.0.0

Updated

  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement Narrow and Widen using SIMDAsHWIntrinsic #60094
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add proposed plan for the COM source generator #60143
    Design Discussion, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix unboxing during CALLI #59747
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Make bounds check nodes ordinary binary opers #59963
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Issue 55685 processname optimisation #59672
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Avoid resetting gen0 bricks for background_sweep #59959
    area-GC-coreclr
  • XARCH: Eliminate redundant mov to/from mem. #59780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/5.0] Add support for variance to IDIC #58672
    area-Interop-coreclr, 5.0.x
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration` #57414
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fallback to read/write if pread/pwrite fails #59846
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Fallback to x64 directory if running x64 process on win-arm64 apphost #59890
    area-Host
  • Add tests exposing issue #60035 #60047
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Optimize indirection cell call sequences more generally #59602
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [JIT] Optimization for left-shift operator #52297
    needs more info, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Updated tests regarding issue #48119 #52994
    area-System.Runtime, needs more info, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fixes of invalid biginteger casting #56710
    area-System.Numerics, needs more info, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder/Loader area #59590
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
    * NO MERGE *
  • Optimize ReadOnlyTernaryTree for System.Private.Xml #60076
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Fix AddEventLog: EventLogSettings not added #57567
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, Future
